channel.title: Need a variable that affects ALL players

item.title: Need a variable that affects ALL players
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

I want to make a command that kills everyone on the server after a 10 second delay. So far I have -

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“nuke”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Dakota”))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (“Nuclear Bomb Going Off In 10 Seconds”);
[glow=red,2,300]PlayerHandler.affectAllPlayers = true;[/glow] < obviously doesn’t exist, but I need something that does the same thing as this would do.
NewHP = 0;
}

It needs to ~
Be set off by - else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“nuke”)
Only I can do it - && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Dakota”))
Needs to give everyone a 10 second warning - PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (“Nuclear Bomb Going Off In 10 Seconds”);
Need to make it have a 10 second delay - need this code
Affects all players - need this code
Kills them all - NewHP = 0;

I believe this is in the right section. If not please move it. Any help appreciated!

Read full topic
item.source: Need a variable that affects ALL players
